Ignatius starts to shake his head, Slayer was going to cause him some bad
trouble if the Maximals heard them. "Take her along if you feal she won't be
in the way. If more than one bot follow then split up and ditch her." he
didn't want anything going wrong, they needed the help but for now the new
bot was expendable.

From:  Yanshosh@a...
Date:  Sun Mar 18, 2001 9:05am
Subject:  Re: Pod...


::Slayer::

Slayer smiles, landing a few feet away from Zoe.

"Good. I'm part of the Trainers, an elite faction. You can join us if
you wish."

While he talks his computer sends a transmission to
Ignatius: "Ignatius, do you want me to send this bot to you or take
her along to attack the Maximal base?"
